Detailed Description

A definition view controller provides a standardized view controller for displaying a Wordnik word definitions.

The definition view controller will handle dispatching of external links from within a definition and loading additional word definitions.

Note:
Definition view controllers must be used with a navigation controller in order to function properly. It is recommended that you present a definition view controller modally or using a pop-over controller.
